ygData.subject: Re: Wizard Spell Components
ygData.msgSnippet: Specialization has been pulled for re-coding, I beleive.  As it was broke in the first place, it isn t a loss.  Once they re-implement it, it should be working
ygData.messageBody:
Specialization has been pulled for re-coding, I beleive. As it was broke in the first place, it isn't a loss. Once they re-implement it, it should be working fine.

-Me
----- Original Message -----
From: Frank Varbel
To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
Sent: Saturday, May 08, 1999 10:40 AM
Subject: [EQ_spell_research] Wizard Spell Components


Greetings fellow students of the Art.

I a 21st level wizard who wants to delve into research headlong. Is it true that for Wizard spells only Runes are needed? Or do the scraps of parchment offer any benefit?

Also, on a side note, what happened to specialization? Cant seem to train in it at the Guild halls anymore.

Thanks,
Arkaine Stormlord
Innoruuk Server
